name: Saxy Kat: Adventures of Kat Saxy
name_original: Saxy Kat: Adventures of Kat Saxy
description:
A musical vertical shoot 'em up modeled after games like Galaga. As feline jazz saxophonist Kat Saxy, take on the hoards of EDM, Emo, and Metal fans in a world where people have different musical tastes ... or something.

Made in Unity in about 48 hours during the Harmonix 2016 Company Game Jam. This isn't the last build of the game that the team made but, it is the only build that still exists. If you want to better understand what the final build was... take what you're playing and make it more polished and with a hell of a lot fewer bugs.

Awards:

  • Best Audio - Harmonix Game Jam 2016

Disclaimer:

This game is not affiliated with nor endorsed by Harmonix Music Systems LLC.

The Team

  • Audio: Jonathan Pardo
  • Art: Alyssa McCallion
  • Engineering: Cian Rice
  • QA/Production: Anthony Verdes
